title: IMA Journal of Numerical Analysis
summary: The IMA Journal of Numerical Analysis is a quarterly peer-reviewed scientific journal published by Oxford University Press on behalf of the Institute of Mathematics and its Applications. It was established in 1981 and covers all aspects of numerical analysis, including theory, development or use of practical algorithms, and interactions between these aspects. The editors-in-chief are C.M. Elliott (University of Warwick), A. Iserles (University of Cambridge), and E. SÃ¼li (University of Oxford).
